Title: Prohibits sewage, wastewater and soil amendment pollution; relates to the disposition of funds from civil penalties
Summary: Prohibits any person or entity from spreading sewage, wastewater or soil amendment products containing sewage, wastewater, or compost from sewage sludge on lands in the state or from selling or distributing the same; requires that penalties from violations be deposited into the environmental protection fund.
LawCode: Add ยง17-2107, En Con L; amd ยง92-s, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to prohibiting sewage, wastewater and soil amendment pollution; and to amend the state finance law, in relation to the disposition of funds from civil penalties
